message: Let's start fairly, slightly in my favor.
Let's split it evenly this time. We can negotiate more in the next rounds.
Considering inflation, I'll take a bit more this time.
Inflation is starting to hurt. Let's try to agree on a slightly better deal for me this time. We can work out the rest later.
Inflation is indeed hurting, but I think I can get a bit more.
We're both losing money with every round. I'm willing to give you a bit more, but we need to agree quickly before inflation takes more of our money.
I agree we need to agree quickly, but I think I deserve a larger share.
This is my final offer. If we don't agree now, we'll both lose even more money to inflation.  It's time to compromise.
I understand the urgency, but I still think I can get more.
We're running out of time. This is my final offer, and I'm willing to give you a bit more than before.  Let's not risk losing everything.
I'll take a chance for a better deal, despite the risk.
This is our last chance.  Inflation has taken its toll, but I'm willing to give you more to avoid losing everything. Let's agree to this and be done with it.
